Hi there, I'm Arjan; I make web things. Say hello at arjan@arjanjassal.com or 778 707 6572.

I'm a front end developer, graphic and UX/UI designer. Creating memorable, interactive experiences is what I look forward to when I wake up, that and bacon. When I'm not fiddling around on CodePen I'm probably reading a web development blog or dreaming about what color palette I should use for this website.

If I were to summarize the way in which I strive to live my life, it would most accurately be captured by this quote from Bruce Lee.

"Adapt what is useful, reject what is useless, and add what is specifically your own."
